definitions.definition: To flow back again; to flow once more.
To cause to flow again, to remelt .
examples: Reflowing solder is a common form of rework in the manufacture of printed circuit boards: you heat up the solder and it flows where it should have flowed the first time.

definitions.definition: To modify the layout of text around other objects in a document.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To flow back again; to flow once more.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , chiefly engineering ) To cause to flow again, to remelt .
( transitive , computing , wordprocessing ) To modify the layout of text around other objects in a document.
